snippet: Third-seeded Pablo Cuevas of Uruguay successfully defended his Brazil Open title on Sunday with a 7-6 (4), 6-3 victory over Pablo Carreno Busta of Spain....
lead_paragraph: Third-seeded Pablo Cuevas of Uruguay successfully defended his Brazil Open title on Sunday with a 7-6 (4), 6-3 victory over Pablo Carreno Busta of Spain.

headline.print_headline: Cuevas Beats Carreno Busta to Keep Title in Brazil
headline.main: Cuevas Beats Carreno Busta to Keep Title in Brazil
